title: Connecticut's Lamont Blasts Trump Order to Stop Wind Power Projects
description: Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont (D) blasted the Trump administration's order to stop work on offshore wind farms. He says they'll help bring down electricity prices. He speaks on "Balance of Power." (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont (D) blasted the Trump administration's order to stop work on offshore wind farms. He says they'll help bring down electricity prices. He speaks on "Balance of Power." (Source: Bloomberg)
